msbt.message: Welcometo my palace!I've filled it full of all the things that make me H-A-P-P-Y HAPPY!Feel free to look at all my fab stuff and validate my life choices!

<20_2 arg="9" />Oh, did something catch your eye? <20_2 arg="10" />My ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yes, the placement is intentional. I have a total VISION for how I want this room to be! And it's working.
Sooo, what do you think of my place? Stylish? Soothing? Perfect? All of the above, maybe?Heehee, don't hold back! I want you to love it here so that you totally want to come back all the time!

<20_2 arg="10" />My <20_3 arg="3" /> is the comfiest thing EVER!<20_3 arg="6" />I like to lay on it while I read Fauna Magazine or Ms. Nintendique. It's SO comfy that sometimes I fall asleepAnd wake up with magazines stuck to my face!
I watch<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> a bunch of music shows so I can keep up with what's trending. But my TV's really here for<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /><10_10 />VIDEO GAMES!
I play my tunes <20_2 arg="10" />really, REALLY loud on my and totes lose myself in the music!<20_2 arg="6" />It's SO seriously the best!Until the neighbors complain.

I just CANNOT live with, you know, schedules! Or having to "be somewhere" at a "certain time."I mean, if I wanted STRUCTURE, I probs wouldn't be an aspiring pop star!Buuut I don't want to be late for dates with friends<20_2 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="10" />so I bought a chic li'l !
My ? Perfect for practicing having fans!You can talk to plants and say, "Oh! Thanks for being a fan!"I can even blow kisses to them and practice getting my targeting just right! Plants are the best.

I love doing some serious relaxing in my <20_2 arg="10" /> after dance practice!<20_3 arg="6" />Sometimes "dance practice" is just me running in circles for 30 minutes, burning off a sugar rushBut I still need a bath!
My<20_2 arg="10" /> is SO the best flat surface for writing you've ever seen!<20_3 arg="6" />I use it for practicing my autograph.
I'm kind of low-key picky about <20_2 arg="10" />my chairs<20_3 arg="6" />Mainly, they've got to look CUTE. The trendier, <20_3 arg="3" />the better! And if they're comfy? That's totes a bonus!

I want to start one of those world- famous bands. You know, the kind that're suuuper popular?So I'm maybe going to learn <20_2 arg="10" />to play the !I already—sometimes—practice singing, <20_3 arg="6" />so just imagine how FAB it'll be once I learn to play this thing.

Isn't my<20_2 arg="10" /> très fabuloso? YeahI'm kind of REALLY into cooking things lately.<20_3 arg="6" />Food. Mostly.I slapped out a stack of pancakes the other day? Whipped cream, fruit, syrup, peanut butterthe works!AndBONUS! Almost half of them weren't burned too badly!

Wondering how <20_2 arg="10" />my
looks in action?Ha! Me too! <20_3 arg="6" />Just putting it there felt like a job well done, so I haven't really used it, !

There's like six diff reality TV shows about pop stars living outdoors this season!I love the outdoors, but I don't know how to, uh, <20_2 arg="3" />use it? The outdoors, I mean. <20_2 arg="9" />So I'm using this to study!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Don't you just love my ? <20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />I mean, it really sets the mood, doesn't it? I am ALLLLL about mood lighting. It really changes the vibe of a place, don't you think? Of course, no matter where I am, I want the vibe to be AWESOME, !

So, I'm totes going to let you in on a little secret. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you see this
This is where the magic happens! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What I mean is, THIS is where I go to create my look! We can all agree my look is 110 percent adorbs, right? And it all comes together right here! I won't tell you anything else about how I put together this fresh fash. The rest is my secret, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Here's the thing. I like to think of this as a kind of treasure chest, you know? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, it's full of all sorts of clothes and accessories that make me look like a million Bells! And what could I possibly treasure more than that, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't my the cutest, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I know some folks don't think bugs are as adorbs as I do.But, you know, maybe bugs don't think THEY'RE adorbs either!

Getting lots of beauty rest is suuuper important for a performer like me.Which is why I brought home <20_2 arg="10" />my <20_2 arg="9" /> hereI don't want to say that watching it swim around in there is boringbut it does put me to sleep every time.

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />So, be honest, what do you think of my ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yeah, it IS pretty fab. It's not chart-topping-pop-song fab, but still, the painter was pretty talented.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know about you, but I think my is supes imposing. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've just got to figure out how to channel that kind of captivating presence and use it onstage. Just you wait and see. Once I do, they'll totes make a statue in honor of MOI, !

Be honest. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Can you, like, tell that my is a fake, ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's hard to tell, right? Like, it totes makes sense someone would think it was real when they bought it. Right? It's still my fave. I mean, fake or real, WHO even cares. Not me. Definitely NOT me.

For a professional-level singer like me,<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> that is a lifesaver.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The last thing I can afford is for my throat to get overheated while I'm doing my vocal exercises. <10_10 />♪ DO-RE-MI-FA-SOL-LA-TI TA-DA! ♪<10_9 />Yeah, these pipes of mine are my golden ticket to stardom. So they get ALL the fresh, cool air they need.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />THIS is the PERFECT pet for a pop star like me, . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Just look at it! It's unique, exotic Everyone who sees it can't take their eyes off it. Wait a sec. Am I being upstaged by ?! What was I thinking?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That's SUCH a good pic of me, right? Def one of my faves. It perfectly captures my whole vibe.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm gonna use it on my album cover, the poster for my self-starring biopic, the label of my very own hot sauceOrle GASP! Imagine being in a big city, turning a corner, and POW—this photo of ME is on a huge billboard!The thought of it is just TOO! MUCH!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, looks like someone wants to play with my totes precious <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Go ahead! No judgments here. Fun is fun, so play as much as you want, !No worrying about folks watching or how much time has passed Wait. What time is it now? What DAY is it?!

I'm like the queen of style, right? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Decorating le humble abode with ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm full of good ideas like that. As this island's resident trendsetter, I'm always looking for hot designs.They aren't hard to spot. If the neon pastels don't catch your eye, the glitter will, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sometimes I just stop what I'm doing, take a breath, and admire my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I love, love, TOTES love decorating. It's the modest touches that shine the most, y'know?I'm gonna glue some modest googly eyes to everything next. This home is about to become MEGA chic!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It took me SO long, but I think I finally found the perfect spot for my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Such a dust magnetbut my decor is at stake! I need some fancy stuff to balance my messy lifestyle!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Doesn't it feel cozy in here thanks to my ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I get so fired up about it that I Wait. FIRED UP? I totes just did a pun, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How do you like me in poster form? I know it can't fully capture my dazzle, but it's still pretty cute!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What's neat is that this was the first shot we took. Or maybe tenth? One of the first few dozen, for sure.As I told the photographer, you can't rush brilliance, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The song itself is fully fab, but honestly, I may like the cover art of more. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Can you even believe how stylish it is to decorate with something like that? I'm full of surprises, tee-hee!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />If I do say so myself, I'm all about the mature vibe I got from decorating with my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You probably think I came up with the idea myself, but I actually got it from a trendy television drama.Wherever you find inspiration, you've gotta just snatch it right up and run with it, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I like to display my favorite things, and OF COURSE that includes my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I love this trend. It's fun. It's bold! And if I need my fave stuff, it's right there. Cute AND convenient!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I have a lot of faves, but that list wouldn't be complete without my !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I like to sip tea and dream about where I could wear something so special, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Be honest. You can't take your eyes off my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />My toes are intensely adorable, so I'm not big on WEARING shoes, but I looove looking at them!
